title: Hackathon Registrations Open!
content: Join our upcoming 24-hour hackathon to innovate, build, and collaborate. Open to all branches!

title: Weekly Meetup This Friday
content: Our weekly meetup will be held in Room 204 at 4PM. Topics include AI, GitHub, and project demos.

title: New Coding Resources Available
content: Check out our new coding resources and tutorials available on the website. Perfect for beginners!

title: Guest Speaker: Tech Innovator
content: Join us for a talk by a leading tech innovator in the field of AI. Don't miss it!
